name: noderef
description: NodeRef - The desktop app every Alfresco admin deserves

scripts.predev:app: pnpm sync:meta && node ./scripts/bin/preflight.mjs && pnpm --filter @app/contracts build && pnpm --filter @app/backend prisma:migrate
scripts.dev:app: pnpm predev:app && run-p --print-label dev:renderer:open dev:backend dev:neutralino:open
scripts.build:installers: rimraf dist/mac_* dist/win_* dist/linux_* dist/*.zip dist/*.AppImage resources/node-src/dist apps/*/dist packages/*/dist .deploy-backend 2>/dev/null || true && node ./scripts/copy-icons.js && node ./scripts/bin/build-installers.mjs
scripts.docker:run: pnpm run docker:build && docker compose up noderef
scripts.purge: rimraf dist bin resources node-src/dist .turbo build-scripts _app_scaffolds '**/*.log' 'apps/**/logs' 'node-src/logs' dev.db 'dev.db*' '**/dev.db' '**/dev.db-*' 'apps/backend/prisma/dev.db' 'apps/backend/prisma/dev.db-*'
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && node ./scripts/fetch-node-binaries.js && npx @neutralinojs/neu update && pnpm sync:meta
